column5: Welcome to Houston!!! Come Enjoy your home away from home at this Beautiful & Entertaining 4 Bed, 3 Bath Home featuring a Pool Hall/Bar & Large Outside Patio/BBQ Area. Watch your favorite shows & Events on Large Flat Screen TVs & for the busy bodies keep up w/ business in our Executive Office Area... This Home is located Less Than 15 mins from IAH airport, 22 mins from Downtown, & 20 mins from the Mall. Restaurants, Banking, & Shopping less than 8 mins away. Feel Secure w/ 24/7 Alarm Monitoring
